visualizations.title: Basmati Rice Export Quantity Forecast (2025-2027)
visualizations.description: Comprehensive forecast timeline showing historical data (blue), test predictions (orange), and future forecasts (green) with clear separation between periods.

visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values (Test Set)
visualizations.description: Actual vs Predicted values scatter plot for test set with perfect prediction reference line showing model accuracy issues.

visualizations.title: Residual Analysis
visualizations.description: Residual analysis showing residuals over time (left) and their distribution (right) to identify prediction patterns and errors.

insights: Model has extremely high MAPE (143,875.52%) and negative RÂ² (-0.39). Predictions show large deviations from actual values. Residual analysis reveals non-random errors and poor fit. Naive Forecast method is not suitable for this dataset.
data.summary: The Naive Forecast model cannot reliably predict Basmati rice exports for 2025-2027 due to its poor performance (MAPE 143,875.52%). The model shows large prediction errors and fails to capture the underlying patterns in the data.
data.task_answer: The Naive Forecast model cannot reliably predict Basmati rice exports for 2025-2027 due to its poor performance (MAPE 143,875.52%). The model shows large prediction errors and fails to capture the underlying patterns in the data.
